attributes.action: Change the Obscene London 2012 Olympic Logo
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The new logo that has been unveiled for the London 2012 Olympics is an embarrasing shoddy mess and reflects poorly on our country. 

We need a new logo now, that reflects our identity and rich heritage.
A competition for School children would envolve and develop Interest and without doubt deliver a better result.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
